thread.title: Pulse Gossip: Flashy Jaguar caught ridding a 'boda boda'
thread.title_full: Pulse Gossip: Flashy Jaguar caught ridding a 'boda boda'

title: Pulse Gossip: Flashy Jaguar caught ridding a 'boda boda'
text:
By Pulse team Saturday, Oct 17th 2015 at 10:31 Kenyan artist Jaguar riding a boda boda 
Known for his flamboyant lifestyle complete with security detail and flashy rides, celebrated singer Jaguar made a spectacle last week after he hit the road riding on a boda boda. 
Jaguar was captured on camera by our snitch. 
“Well, it is true I did ride a boda boda but this does not mean my cars were not available. It is not that, really, as some people who spotted me are trying to say,” Jaguar told Pulse. 
“I had an urgent meeting I was rushing for and with the kind of traffic in Nairobi, I found it wise to use a boda boda else I would be caught in the jam,” he explained. “I was leaving the country for an overseas trip and the youth group I was meeting had to get some serious matters sorted and this was the only option I could get to reach them. 
Besides, did you expect me to fly a chopper on the highway or get a presidential escort to clear the highway?” he joked. SIMILAR STORIES 2 days ago
